## Vault.collateralRatioIsBelowMinimum() method

Whether the Vault is undercollateralized at a given price.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
collateralRatioIsBelowMinimum(price: Decimalish): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  price | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the Vault's collateralization ratio is less than the [MINIMUM\_COLLATERAL\_RATIO](./lib-base.minimum_collateral_ratio.md)<!-- -->.
